text: Sverigetopplistan, also known as Topplistan and Hitlistan, is since October 2007 the Swedish national record chart, based on sales data from Swedish Recording Industry Association. Since late 2006 the chart has included legal downloads. The following charts are included: *Singles Top 60 *Albums Top 60 *DVDs Top 20 *Ringtones Top 20 1976â€“2006 the sales chart was broadcast on Sveriges Radio P3. From 2007, P3 only presents sales data for digital downloads (DigiListan), tracked by Nielsen SoundScan. ==Other websites== *Sverigetopplistan *The archive Category:Swedish music Category:Record charts
title: Sverigetopplistan
